items.title: Team Collaboration Features
items.description: Enable multiple users to collaborate on tasks within shared projects, including assigning tasks, commenting, and updating statuses.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a shared project and invite team members via email
Users can assign tasks to specific team members
Users can add comments to tasks visible to all project members
Task status changes are visible to all team members in real-time
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent active users without performance degradation
Real-time updates should have latency under 2 seconds

notes: Assumed that core task management features (create, edit, delete tasks) are already part of the base app; requirement focuses on collaboration aspects.
